meanings: [명사] announcement, statement, presentation, [동사] announce, issue, make public; (의견·연구 결과 등을) present; (책 등을) publish; (책·음반 등을) release
give the first public performance of a new piece

vlive.korean: 발표는 다 같이 하는 거였나? Did we do that all together? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [DAY6] 🦊창의력대장 마데와 함께하는 삐롱이의 밸런스게임😱 (Young K’s balance game)
vlive.english: Did we do that all together?

vlive.korean: [이제 윤형이 만든 음식을 발표할 시간] 그럼 발표할까요? [Time to reveal SONG's dish] Shall we announce now? 듣기 View video iKON : iKON-ON : THAI FOOD CHALLENGE
vlive.english: [Time to reveal SONG's dish] Shall we announce now?

vlive.korean: 최다 득표가... - 내가 한 음식 내가 지금 발표하면 되는 거 아닌가? The most votes... - Can I just announce what I made? 듣기 View video iKON : iKON-ON : THAI FOOD CHALLENGE
vlive.english: The most votes... - Can I just announce what I made?

vlive.korean: [예선 ROUND 결과 발표] - 오케이 기록이 나왔다고 합니다 - 나왔나요? [Preliminary results] - We've got the results. - Have we? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.21 네발라이더 #1 (Four Wheeled Rider #1)
vlive.english: [Preliminary results] - We've got the results. - Have we?

vlive.korean: 발표해요? Do I announce it? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “TWICE의 MBTI를 찾아서” EP. 사나

examples.korean: Who gave the authorization to release the data? 발음듣기 누가 그 자료 발표를 인가했죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Who gave the authorization to release the data? 발음

examples.korean: to announce/declare/withdraw your candidacy for the post 발음듣기 그 직책에 출마를 발표하다/선언하다/철회하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to announce/declare/withdraw your candidacy for the post 발음

examples.korean: He announced his resignation to a roomful of reporters. 발음듣기 그는 방을 가득 메운 기자들에게 사임을 발표했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He announced his resignation to a roomful of reporters. 발음

examples.korean: Pandemonium broke out when the news was announced. 발음듣기 그 소식이 발표되자 대혼란이 벌어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Pandemonium broke out when the news was announced. 발음

examples.korean: The statement was carefully scrutinized before publication. 발음듣기 그 성명은 발표 전에 면밀히 검토되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The statement was carefully scrutinized before publication. 발음
